title: 2019-11-29 - Libertad y gloria - A Mexican cyber heist story - CyberCrimeCon19 Singapore
plain_text:
# Libertad y gloria - A Mexican cyber heist story - CyberCrimeCon19 Singapore

**[github.com/fboldewin/Libertad-y-gloria---A-Mexican-cyber-heist-story---CyberCrimeCon19-Singapore](https://github.com/fboldewin/Libertad-y-gloria---A-Mexican-cyber-heist-story---CyberCrimeCon19-Singapore)**

fboldewin

This is a case i started investigating in March 2019 after one of my VT hunting rules raised
an alarm of a newly submitted file, matching my generic search pattern for ATM malware. An
interesting case with a very unlikely ATM malware and a bad opsec during the IR process
which made it possible for me to restruct a lot of details about this cyber heist.


-----
references: https://papers.vx-underground.org/papers/Malware Defense/Malware Analysis 2019/2019-11-29 - Libertad y gloria - A Mexican cyber heist story - CyberCrimeCon19 Singapore.pdf
